links.title: Interview with AMD's Su on change in foundry, its roadmap and new head of client-compute business
links.description: By Advanced Micro Devices faces two issues that at first glance appear as risks. A partner that AMD was working with on its transition to 7-nanometer (nm) technology announced Monday that it would no longer be pursuing so-called "leading edge" silicon manufacturing.
